GSD.description:
perf hist: Fix memory leak of a perf_hpp_fmt

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.164 by commit b380d09e44e8479e71e3ae8446b515a5b3166244. For more details please see the references link.
